meanings: lose one's ground[space] to stand on
have no ground[space] to stand on

vlive.korean: 여기에 섰던 그 선배님들 이런 느낌이었을까? Would the seniors that performed here had the same feeling? 듣기 View video DAY6 : 마이데이 고마워요🙏🏻❤️
vlive.english: Would the seniors that performed here had the same feeling?

vlive.korean: 하지만 저는 '원아시아페스티벌'때 큰 무대 섰던 게 기억에 남아요, 좋은 기억으로. But I remember performing at the "One Asia Festival", on the big stage. 듣기 View video MOMOLAND : 🎡2주년😍😍😍😍🎡
vlive.english: But I remember performing at the "One Asia Festival", on the big stage.

vlive.korean: 뿌듯하고. - 강단에 섰던 사람으로서 뿌듯합니다. So proud of you. - As a lecture, I'm proud. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : [REPLAY] 임시완 X 진구 <원라인> 무비토크 라이브 'Lim SiWan X Jin Goo MovieTalk LIVE'
vlive.english: So proud of you. - As a lecture, I'm proud.

vlive.korean: 예전에는 몸 풀기 없이 무대에 섰던 적이 있었어요. Actually we used to perform without stretching our body. 듣기 View video B.A.P : 도쿄2
vlive.english: Actually we used to perform without stretching our body.

vlive.korean: [꾹이의 첫 무대가 룰라 콘서트!] 처음 무대 섰던 게 룰라 콘서트에요. [Kook's debut stage] I was the opening act for Roo'ra's concert. 듣기 View video Big Picture : 빅픽처 ep14_이상민 전격 해부 뼛속까지 털어 보자!
vlive.english: [Kook's debut stage] I was the opening act for Roo'ra's concert.

examples.korean: The dismantled rights commission came under strong criticism, because countries with identifiably poor human rights records used their membership to protect one another from censure. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 인권이사회 설립에 앞장섰던 코피 아난 유엔 사무총장은 신설 이후 처음 열리는 이번 회의에 참석하기 위해 제네바를 방문할 것으로 보입니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The dismantled rights commission came under strong criticism, because countries with identifiably poor human rights records used their membership to protect one another from censure. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: As the chief archaeologist behind the excavations on Thera, he passionately believed in the myth begun with Plato's dialogues. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 테라 섬 발굴에 앞장섰던 수석고고학자인 그는 플라톤의 담화에서 시작된 신화를 열성적으로 믿었다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: As the chief archaeologist behind the excavations on Thera, he passionately believed in the myth begun with Plato's dialogues. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He also displayed his military and administrative skills in quelling rebellions, including the Battle of Philippi (42 BC) in which he defeated Caesar’s leading assassins, Marcus Junius Brutus (85-42 BC) and Gaius Cassius Longinus (85-42 BC); finding colonies; administering regions; carrying out public works; and building edifices, including the Pantheon in Rome. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 또한 시저의 암살에 앞장섰던 마르쿠스 유니우스 브루투스 (기원전 85년-기원전 42년)와 가이우스 카시우스 롱기누스 (기원전85년-기원전 42년)등을 물리친 필립피 전투 (기원전 42년)와 같은 반란 진압; 식민지 개척; 지방 행정; 공공 사업; 로마에 있는 판테온을 비롯한 건축물 건립 등과 같은 일에 군사적 행정적 수완을 발휘하였다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: He also displayed his military and administrative skills in quelling rebellions, including the Battle of Philippi (42 BC) in which he defeated Caesar’s leading assassins, Marcus Junius Brutus (85-42 BC) and Gaius Cassius Longinus (85-42 BC); finding colonies; administering regions; carrying out public works; and building edifices, including the Pantheon in Rome. Add to Wordbook
